elements.text: Why did you decide to end the program? Please check all that apply.

buttons: 0::I did not have enough time to complete the program
1::I did not find the program helpful for reducing my anxiety
2::I did not find the program interesting
3::I did not believe a program like this could work
4::I found the program frustrating to use
5::I no longer needed the program (i.e., I no longer felt anxious)
6::I believe I was assigned to the control condition (i.e., the condition that was not expected to change anxiety)
